mapper.insert: insert into creditLoanBase (creditLoanID, dclsMonth, comNum, prdNum, comName, prdName, joinWay, crdtTypeName, cbName, dclsStart) values (#{creditLoanID}, #{dclsMonth}, #{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{comName}, #{prdName}, #{joinWay}, #{crdtTypeName}, #{cbName}, #{dclsStart})

insert into creditLoanOption (creditLoanID, dclsMonth, comNum, prdNum, crdtLendRateTypeName, crdtGrade9Up, crdtGrade8Up, crdtGrade7Up, crdtGrade6Up, crdtGrade5Up, crdtGrade4Up, crdtGrade3Up, crdtGrade3Down, crdtGradeAvg) values (#{creditLoanID}, #{dclsMonth}, #{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{crdtLendRateTypeName}, #{crdtGrade9Up}, #{crdtGrade8Up}, #{crdtGrade7Up}, #{crdtGrade6Up}, #{crdtGrade5Up}, #{crdtGrade4Up}, #{crdtGrade3Up}, #{crdtGrade3Down}, #{crdtGradeAvg})
mapper.select: SELECT b.creditLoanID, comName, prdName, joinWay, crdtTypeName, cbName, crdtLendRateTypeName, crdtGrade9Up, crdtGrade8Up, crdtGrade7Up, crdtGrade6Up, crdtGrade5Up, crdtGrade4Up, crdtGrade3Up, crdtGrade3Down, crdtGradeAvg FROM creditLoanBase as b inner join creditLoanOption as o on b.creditLoanID = o.creditLoanID

SELECT * FROM creditLoanBase as cb inner join creditLoanOption as co on cb.creditLoanID = co.creditLoanID WHERE comName like CONCAT('%', #{prdName}, '%') and joinWay like CONCAT('%', #{joinWay}, '%') and crdtTypeName like CONCAT('%', #{crdtTypeName}, '%')

SELECT b.comName, b.prdName, joinWay, crdtTypeName, cbName, crdtLendRateTypeName, crdtGrade9Up, crdtGrade8Up, crdtGrade7Up, crdtGrade6Up, crdtGrade5Up, crdtGrade4Up, crdtGrade3Up, crdtGrade3Down, crdtGradeAvg FROM creditLoanBase b, creditLoanOption o where b.creditLoanID = o.creditLoanID AND b.creditLoanID = #{creditLoanID}

SELECT b.comName, b.prdName, joinWay, crdtTypeName, cbName, crdtLendRateTypeName, crdtGrade9Up, crdtGrade8Up, crdtGrade7Up, crdtGrade6Up, crdtGrade5Up, crdtGrade4Up, crdtGrade3Up, crdtGrade3Down, crdtGradeAvg FROM creditLoanBase b, creditLoanOption o where b.creditLoanID = o.creditLoanID AND b.creditLoanID = #{creditLoanID}
